scripts.deploy: npm run build && gh-pages -d dist -m "deploy: update"
scripts.predeploy: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process'); const s=execSync('git status --porcelain=v2 --branch',{encoding:'utf8'}); if(/rebase in progress|no branch|detached|REBASING/i.test(execSync('git status',{encoding:'utf8'}))){ console.error('\\n[STOP] 你目前在 rebase / detached HEAD 狀態，請先完成：git rebase --continue 或放棄：git rebase --abort\\n'); process.exit(1);} if(!s.includes('branch.head main')){ console.error('\\n[STOP] 你目前不在 main 分支，請先：git checkout main\\n'); process.exit(1);} "
scripts.sync: git fetch origin && git pull --rebase origin main
scripts.ship: npm run predeploy && npm run sync && git push origin main && npm run deploy
scripts.ship:force: npm run predeploy && npm run sync && git push origin main && npm run build && gh-pages -d dist -m "deploy: update" --dotfiles
